title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 133.11 - Request for Adjournment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 133.11 - Request for Adjournment

State Regulations
(a) A
request for an adjournment of a hearing shall be made in writing and submitted
to the administrative law judge and other parties prior to the
hearing. (b) Adjournments shall be
granted only by the administrative law judge, and only after the administrative
law judge has consulted with all parties. When granted, adjournments should be
assigned a specific time, date and place. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
133.11

Adopted

New

York State Register December 31, 2024/Volume XLVII, Issue 53, eff. 12/31/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
